alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gilmer; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gilmer, western Dawson and eastern Pickens Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Fausett Lake, or 9 miles northeast of Jasper, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Nelson, Amicalola Falls State Park, Sequoyah Lake, Lake Tamarack, Marblehill, Tate, Juno and Fausett Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
